review: Easy set-up, intuitive remote and very little lag over the wireless.  Much better than the AppleTV I previously had installed.  Many more free shows and movies than Apple with a prime membership.  Well worth it.
author: SC-techie

review: I have really enjoyed using this. I have never used one before and it was really easy to figure out.  I did have to look on the Youtube website to learn how to use Netflix on it though.
author: Laurie "lovebooks"

review: It works right out of the box. Couldn't be happier.
author: K. McNulty "internet shopping is the best"

review: this is an awesome device. We don't have cable so rely solely on Amazon Prime, Netflix and Hulu for our programs. This device brings all those apps plus more right to our TV. We loved it so much we got one for each TV in our home. I love the parental controls which keeps our kids from purchasing things and also blocks content we don't want them to have access to. Love it!
author: Rev_Jenn

review: Feels sluggish is about my only complaint.
author: Freon424

review: I love this device. Easy set up I can order prime movies and watch Netflix love it
author: shawnica isaac
